title: Joe investigates how vigorously the Group 2 elements react with water. He wants to find out if there is a trend in these reactions. How can I identify one variable Joe should keep constant? - Quora

response.answer_text: In such an experiment there are a couple of things you will want to keep constant. The first one would be the temperature of all reactants. The second would be the concentration of the reactants.
Joe seems very busy. Keep constant: temperature of the water. Volume of water volume of metal (rather than mass). Temperature of water the best to choose.
